page.title: 13Transport & occupations
page.content:
Shenington, Alkerton and Balscote are served by the Midland Red Bus Company (National). There is 1 daily evening service plus 1 extra on a Thursday and Saturday (Market days). Shutford is served by a private bus service. Twice on Thursdays and once on Saturdays. 61% of families in Shutford never use the bus, 29% sometimes, and 10% regularly. The 100 families in Shutford own over 200 cars between them. 92 people in Shutford are in full time occupation, 19 part time.
All villages journey to work 87% car 5% walk 45% work in Banbury 19% work in own village 21% work more than 20 miles away
